column4: when trying to setup wireless in ubuntu 6.06, it finds the adaptor it lets me activate it and (sometimes) connect to the AP. gets dns and ip but internet ect dont work. any suggestions ?
that depends on the DHCP server <-> client configuration, find out that you get the right ip, gateway and dns from the router.
just internet says theres no connection
strange, can you ping the gateway from your isp?
olsen> yes and i get an answer
sure you have all the DNS in /etc/resolv.conf ?
olsen> funny thng is i have a friend with the same adapter as me and i have him try and the adapter and everything worked fine
could t be that it finds the wrong "driver " for my adapter
olsen> had to go back to windows to get online again :(
do you have the same ip address, gateway and DNS's in windows and ubuntu?
